ventil_pre.value: Calculation of valve setting for hydraulic balancing

ventil_liefer.value: Is included in the standard delivery; the valve preset can be changed as required simply by turning it.

ventil_liefer2.value: If the other integral valve (N instead of U or U instead of N) is to be used, this must be ordered separately.

ventil_laut.value: If the differential pressure is over 200 mbar, noises may develop in the piping!

ventil_error_n.value: Kv value too high - please adjust the spread or valve differential pressure!

ventil_error_u.value: Kv value too high – please select integral valve N or adjust the spread!

msg_bestand_pre.value: Select the basis for the stock calculation!

msg_bestand_bedarf.value: To determine the approximate heat demand of your residence, please select your home's year of construction from the following table and the corresponding heating requirement value. The calculation involves multiplying by the size of the room to be heated. Due to the wide range of possible building heating requirements, this estimate can only provide imprecise results. The two options presented above provide significantly more accurate results and should therefore be given priority if possible. The "Accept" button moves the calculated value into the "Room heating requirement " field.

msg_bestand_radiator.value: The room heating requirement can be roughly estimated on the basis of old [b]cast-iron or steel radiators[*b] installed. The "Accept" button moves the calculated value into the "Room heating requirement" field.

msg_druck_warning.value: The entry of the differential pressure is limited to 200 mbar!

msg_leistung_warning.value: The radiator heat output is less than the room heating requirement entered! Still accept?

msg_invalid_product.value: The specified product number does not exist!

msg_toReport.value: Please enter the quantity for the sales report. The product is not added to any report if you click "Cancel"!

msg_removeReport.value: Are you sure you want to remove the selected item from the technical report?

msg_removeKReport.value: Are you sure you want to remove the selected item from the sales report?

msg_toCart.value: Do you want to add the item to the basket and the technical report? Please enter a quantity for the item!

msg_toProject.value: Do you want to add the item to the project? Clicking the "Project" button enables the creation of the project to be processed further! Please enter a quantity for the item!

msg_amount_null.value: Please enter a quantity greater than 0!

msg_updateRoom.value: Enter a name for the room!

msg_updateStueck.value: Enter a quantity for the item!

msg_ugs_bud.value: Please enter the Buderus ID from your sales program (max. 4 characters)
